End Section 1
Start Section 2
About us
Being family-owned and operated for over 30 years by Mike and Norma Shelow, there is a friendly and familiar atmosphere when you walk in…. whether ordering lunch, burgers & wings, dinner, cocktails or enjoying our panoramic view of Biscayne Bay, you will never forget your time at Mike’s.
End Section 2
Start Section Custom
Our People
Mike’s is the perfect destination for sports fans (DirectTV with 20 HD TVs throughout the restaurant, bar, and patio), families, locals, and anyone that wants to get away from the franchise bar & grill experience. Our team of bartenders and servers wear their Mike’s shirts with pride.
Any other website text: Voted one of America's best sports bars, Mike's at Venetia offers a wide variety of great food and drinks, served poolside with a view or inside the pub.
Our menu is filled with American favorites: burgers, sandwiches, salads, soups, pasta, seafood, steak, chicken and more. Mike's is open for lunch, dinner and late night until 3 a.m. and features Happy Hour Monday through Friday from 4 p.m. until 7 p.m. Our kitchen stays open until 2:30 a.m. so you can have delicious food all evening.
Join us for the game on any of our 20 TVs throughout the restaurant and patio. We have DirecTV, so if it’s being played, we can watch it! We also offer specials during all NFL football games. Are you in the mood for some billiards? Great, because we have tables! Mike’s loves parties, so host your next private event with us!
We are located on the 9th floor of Venetia by the Venetian Causeway, next to the Biscayne Bay Marriott Hotel
End Section Custom
Start Section 3

End Section 3
